area.tooltip: Surface Area: The total area of the surface of the 3D object.

vol.tooltip: Volume: The amount of space enclosed by the 3D object's surface.

nsi.tooltip: Normalized Shape Index (NSI): Deviation from a perfect sphere (NSI=1.0).

sphericity.tooltip: Sphericity: How spherical an object is (1.0 for a perfect sphere).

sa_vol_ratio.tooltip: Surface Area to Volume Ratio: Ratio of surface area to volume.

solidity.tooltip: Solidity (Convexity): Ratio of object volume to its convex hull volume.

elongation.tooltip: Elongation: Ratio of the largest to smallest dimension of the bounding box.
